data.title: How many episodes are in The Bear season 3 on Disney Plus and Hulu?
data.meta_description: Here's your complete guide to streaming The Bear season 3 on Disney Plus and Hulu
data.text:
The Bear season 3 is finally here. All episodes of the third installment dropped at once, so you can get stuck in to your next serving right away.

The hugely popular series starring starring Jeremy Allen White as chef Carmy is back on Hulu and FX in the US right now, and Disney Plus in the UK and around the world. The action picks up again shortly after the season 2 finale, which saw Carmy locked in the walk-in fridge after restaurant The Bear's opening didn't go quite to plan.

If you're a bit unsure about what's on the menu for season 3, though, then you're in the right place. We've got everything you need to know about streaming The Bear season 3, including how many episodes there are and how to watch. Yes chef!

How many episodes of The Bear season 3 are there?

In total, there are 10 episodes of The Bear season 3. This is the same as season 2, which upped the count from eight episodes in season 1.

The Bear season 3 release schedule

The Bear season 3 released all episodes at once on Hulu, FX, and Disney Plus. The titles for the episodes are as follows:

The Bear season 3 episode 1 – ‘Tomorrow’: June 26, 2024

The Bear season 3 episode 2 – ‘Next’: June 26, 2024

The Bear season 3 episode 3 – ‘Doors’: June 26, 2024

The Bear season 3 episode 4 – ‘Violet’: June 26, 2024

The Bear season 3 episode 5 – ‘Children’: June 26, 2024

The Bear season 3 episode 6 – ‘Napkins’: June 26, 2024

The Bear season 3 episode 7 – ‘Legacy’: June 26, 2024

The Bear season 3 episode 8 – ‘Ice Chips’: June 26, 2024

The Bear season 3 episode 9 – ‘Apologies’: June 26, 2024

The Bear season 3 episode 10 – ‘Forever’: June 26, 2024

The Bear season 3 released on June 26 at 9:00 PM ET/6:00 PM Pacific on Hulu and FX in the US. All episodes released at once.

In the UK, they were available at the same time on Disney Plus. That means season 3 launched at 2:00 AM BST on June 27.

For other regions, use the time zone converter.
